sqlQuery.name: SequenceAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.source_id, eas.length, eas.description AS product, eas.molecular_weight, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, ot.name AS taxon_name, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(ec.ec_number) as apidb.varchartab)), ', ') FROM dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id GROUP by eas.secondary_identifier ) as ec_numbers FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.orthomcltaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGroup
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.full_id, sa.group_name, sa.group_size FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa

sqlQuery.name: SequenceSequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.sequence FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas

sqlQuery.name: OldGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, ref.primary_identifier AS group_name FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups'

sqlQuery.name: PFamDomains
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db, dots.AaLocation al WHERE df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND df.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id ORDER BY al.start_min ASC, al.end_max ASC

sqlQuery.name: Product
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.description AS product FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas

sqlQuery.name: Taxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, ot.name AS taxon FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.orthomcltaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: EcNumbers
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier as full_id, ec.ec_number, ec.description, 'http://enzyme.expasy.org/cgi-bin/enzyme/enzyme-search-ec?field1=' || ec.ec_number_1 || chr(38) || 'field2=' || ec.ec_number_2 || chr(38) || 'field3=' || ec.ec_number_3 || chr(38) || 'field4=' || ec.ec_number_4 as expasy_url FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id
